entry.string:
Do you really want to exit Setup now?
If you quit now, the program will not be installed on your computer. You may run Setup again later to complete the installation.

data.entry:
Da li zaista želite sada da otkažete instalaciju?
Ukoliko istu otkažete sada, program neće biti instaliran na Vašem računaru. Možete kasnije ponovo pokrenuti ovu instalaciju i istu u potpunosti završiti.

entry.string: The Setup will be cancelled now!
Select the folder in which the program will be installed:

data.entry: Odaberite folder u kome će program biti instaliran:

entry.string: Move the mouse over a component entry to show a description

data.entry: Postavite miša iznad komponente (ali nemojte kliknuti!) da se prikaže opis iste

entry.string:
Welcome to the %NAME% Setup Wizard
This will install %NAME% %VERSION% on your computer.
It is recommended that you close all other applications you have running before continuing. This will help avoiding possible conflicts during the installation process.
Click Next to continue, or Cancel to exit Setup.

data.entry:
Dobrodošli u %NAME% Instalacioni Pomoćnik
isti će instalirati %NAME% %VERSION% na Vašem računaru.
Preporučujemo da zatvorite sve ostale pokrenute aplikacije pre nastavka. Ovo će pomoći u izbegavanju mogućih konflikata tokom instalacije.
Kliknite na "Nastavi" da nastavite, ili na "Otkaži" da napustite instalaciju.

entry.string: Please read the following license agreement. Click Yes to accept the agreement, or No to cancel the Setup.

data.entry: Molimo pažljivo pročitajte sledeću saglasnost sa licencom. Kliknite na "Da" za prihvatanje iste, ili na "Ne" da otkažete instalaciju.

entry.string:
Setup will install %NAME% in the following folder.
To install into a different folder, click Browse, and select another folder.

data.entry:
Setup će instalirati %NAME% u sledeći folder.
Da instalirate u drugi folder, kliknite na "Pretraži", i odaberite željeni folder.

entry.string: Select the components you want to install.

data.entry: Odaberite komponente koje želite da instalirate.

entry.string: Setup - Start Menu and Desktop Shortcuts

data.entry: Setup - Start Meni i Desktop prečice

entry.string: Setup can create shortcuts to the installed program. Please select which shortcuts shall be created.

data.entry: Setup može napraviti prečice za instalirani program. Molimo odaberite koje prečice će biti napravljene.

entry.string:
Setup is now ready to install %NAME% on your computer.
Click Next to install the program files on your computer, or Cancel to exit Setup.

data.entry:
Setup je sada spreman da instalira %NAME% na Vašem računaru.
Kliknite na "Nastavi" da instalirate aplikaciju na Vašem računaru, ili na "Otkaži" da izađete iz Setup-a.

entry.string:
Setup is copying the program files to your computer.
Please wait until the installation process has finished. You can then start working with the installed program.

data.entry:
Setup kopira programske fajlove na Vaš računar.
Molimo sačekajte da se proces instalacije završi. Onda možete započeti sa korišćenjem instaliranog programa.

entry.string:
Congratulations! %NAME% %VERSION% has been successfully installed on your computer.
You can now start %NAME% from the Windows Start menu.
Click Finish to close the setup wizard.

data.entry:
Čestitamo! %NAME% %VERSION% je uspešno instaliran na Vašem računaru.
Sada možete pokrenuti %NAME% iz Windows Start menija.
Kliknite na "Završi" da zatvorite instalacioni pomoćnik.

entry.string: Install an online update component that will notify you about new software versions

data.entry: Instaliraj komponentu onlajn ažuriranja, koja će Vas obaveštavati o novim verzijama aplikacije

entry.string: Install a command line interface useful for use in batch scripts

data.entry: Instaliraj command line prikaz koji je koristan u beč skriptama

entry.string: Install an easy to use application for editing %NAME% XML language files

data.entry: Instaliraj, laku za korišćenje, aplikaciju za izmene %NAME% XML jezičkih fajlova

entry.string: Install the complete C++ source code to %NAME%

data.entry: Instaliraj kompletan C++ izvorni kod za %NAME%
